entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
